paper_abstract: This study presents an H-infinity controller design time-delay T-S fuzzy systems based on the fuzzy Lyapunov method, which is defined in terms of fuzzy blending quadratic Lyapunov functions. The delay-dependent robust stability criterion is derived in terms of the fuzzy Lyapunov method to guarantee the stability of time-delay T-S fuzzy systems subjected to disturbances. Based on the delay-dependent condition and parallel distributed compensation (PDC) scheme, the controller design problem is transformed into solving linear matrix inequalities (LMI).
paper_title: A novel delay-dependent criterion for time-delay T-S fuzzy system using fuzzy Lyapunov method
